Gradus ad Pynassum

Aug 12, 2019

道可道非常道。(TAO called TAO is not TAO) - Tao te Ching. Lao Tzu (tr Addiss and Lombardo)

πολυμαθίη νόον οὐ διδάσκει (Much learning does not teach understanding). Heraclitus (fragment 40).

CodeGrades (initially) targets Python as a language for learning programming. This post explains why.

CodeGrades are cumulative steps for learning how to code. Level up by applying the knowledge and skills needed for each grade to your own fun, interesting and challenging coding projects.
